metadata.description: Collection of Claude Code skills for browser automation, context management, and product requirements

plugins.name: auto-browser
plugins.description: Automate Chrome via Puppeteer to browse, navigate, scrape and capture web pages

plugins.name: context-keeper
plugins.description: Maintains project context through progressive disclosure and enforced documentation

plugins.name: ideate-pm
plugins.description: Product Requirements Manager for ideation and product management

plugins.name: feature-development-workflow
plugins.description: Systematic feature development following a 5-phase workflow: Discovery → Exploration → Documentation → Implementation → Review
